# Game Center Enabled Versions

**API Collection**

Manage compatible Game Center-enabled versions.

## Overview

Use a `gameCenterEnabledVersions` resource to indicate which versions of your app support Game Center. For more information see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/configure-game-center/overview-of-game-center].

## Listing Versions

- **List All Game Center Enabled Versions for an App**
- **List All Compatible Versions for a Game Center Enabled Version**

## Getting and Adding Compatible Versions

- **Get All Compatible Version IDs for a Game Center Enabled Version**
- **Add Compatible Versions to a Game Center Enabled Version**

## Removing and Replacing Compatible Versions

- **Replace All Compatible Versions for a Game Center Enabled Version**
- **Remove Compatible Versions from a Game Center Enabled Version**

## Objects

- **GameCenterEnabledVersion**: The data structure that represents the Game Center Enabled Versions resource.
- **GameCenterEnabledVersionCompatibleVersionsLinkagesRequest**: A request body you use to add or remove compatible versions from a Game Center-enabled version.
- **GameCenterEnabledVersionCompatibleVersionsLinkagesResponse**: A response body that contains a list of related resource IDs.
- **GameCenterEnabledVersionsResponse**: A response that contains a list of Game Center Enabled Version resources.
- **AppGameCenterEnabledVersionsLinkagesResponse**
